document.heading: SAFE RELEASE OF INMATES AMENDMENT ACT OF 2010.

history.narrative: Law 18-190, the “Safe Release of Inmates Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-424, which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 2, 2010, and March 16, 2010, respectively. Enacted without signature by the Mayor on April 8, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-379 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-190 became effective on July 23, 2010.
